column2:
```r
df_monthly_normals <- precip_data %>% 
  filter(Year >= 1980) %>% 
  
  group_by(STATE, Month) %>% 
  summarise(observation_value = mean(Precip_inches)) %>% 
  
  rename(group_name = STATE)
```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'STATE'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
